title: Trimming, first half of 19th century
medium:
Medium: wool, linen, silk
Technique: stamped
description: Fragment from curtain (rings still at top) of warm red, hard-surfaced wool, stamped in barely visible design of large all-over floral motifs. Bordered along one side by woven linen-and-silk strip in wreath and anthemioh design, also red.

tombstone.epitaph:
Trimming, first half of 19th century.
first half of 19th century. Medium: wool, linen, silk
Technique: stamped. Gift of Lea S. Luquer. 1958-148-13-d.
